doc.content: The search string
Supports these types of objects: All public posts (post), people (user), pages (page), events (event), groups (group), check-ins (checkin)
Search over all public objects in the social graph
The search string

Unique URL to the achievement.

Order of this achievement as it shows up in the achievement stories UI (low to high). For example a display order of 100 will be displayed in the UI before 200. We use this value to surface achievements according to the order the developer has specified. Please make sure this value is unique and increments in the correct order for your achievements.
